Character_1.Name: Psyduck
Character_1.Character_Summary: Psyduck is a Water-type Pokémon known for its constant headache, which intensifies its psychic powers. It often appears confused but can unleash powerful psychic attacks when its headache becomes severe.

Move_1.Description: Shoots a jet of water at the opponent.

Move_2.Description: A psychic attack that may confuse the opponent.

Character_2.Name: Oshawott
Character_2.Character_Summary: Oshawott is a Water-type Pokémon that is confident and brave. It uses the scalchop on its belly as a weapon and shield. However, its overconfidence can sometimes lead it into trouble.

Move_1.Description: Slashes the opponent with a sharp shell.

Move_2.Description: Attacks with a pulsing blast of water.

Move_3.Description: Strikes the opponent with a quick water-infused charge.
